item.title: Activist Dan Loeb dusts off his poison pen as he seeks a board refresh at CoStar Group
item.description: Investors are seeing shades of yesteryear's Dan Loeb in a letter he recently wrote to the CoStar board.

item.title: Software shares are among the most oversold stocks in the S&P 500
item.description: Software giants such as Intuit and Palantir were among this week's most oversold stocks. Memory stocks topped CNBC's screen of overbought names.

item.title: Palantir and these other stocks reporting next week have earnings momentum at their back
item.description: The list of companies where analysts have lately lifted estimates includes Ralph Lauren and Palantir.

item.title: Trump finally makes his Fed chair pick â€” what Kevin Warsh means for investors
item.description: Investors see the former Fed governor as a credible steward of monetary policy despite expectations he may push for lower rates.

item.title: Buy gold and sell silver as the metals' run to record unwinds, says Carter Worth
item.description: Carter Worth looks at the silver/gold ratio.
